name: Scareclaw Alternative
desc: Tribute 3 "Scareclaw" monsters; for the rest of this turn, your opponent can only Special Summon monsters in Defense Position. During your turn: Banish this card from your GY; inflict 100 damage to your opponent for each Defense Position monster on the field. You can only use this effect of "Scareclaw Alternative" once per turn.

card_sets.set_name: 25th Anniversary Tin: Dueling Heroes Mega Pack
